actions.name: create new gist
actions.description: Create a new gist on github.com.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: A string description of the Gist. Default is empty

parameters.name: public
parameters.description: A boolean value indicating whether the gist is public or not. Default is false.

parameters.name: fileN
parameters.description: This parameter can be defined multiple times. The "N" in the name is a placeholder for a unique name for the file. The value of the argument is the content of the file
